data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 24492, Version Hash: 13b18e92b24be4f83ed124a4d09b6267810b7605
data.actual_result: Incorrect, supposedly English position-wise equivalent keys are shown even when the "correct" hotkeys are registered.
data.expected_result: The preview for the hotkey should show exactly the keys you pressed.
data.short_description: Hotkey settings preview doesn't show correct key I'm pressing on German keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - have Discord Desktop set to German and have a German keyboard - go anywhere where you can set hotkeys, e.g. settings>hotkeys or >overlay->hotkeys - click on edit/add hotkey where it then goes into key input recording mode - input one of the certain keys that differ between German QWERTZ and English QWERTY keyboards, e.g "Ä" or "#"
